site.name: CORE ATHLETE
site.description: Professional athletic training and development for all sports and skill levels.

hero.title: TRAIN WITH CORE ATHLETE
hero.subtitle: Creating. Opportunities. Realigning. Expectations. Build strength, speed, and confidence with our science-based training programs.

about.title: What Sets C.O.R.E. Athlete Apart
about.subtitle: Our training philosophy
description: Our training philosophy is built around four core principles that drive every program we create.
We believe in creating opportunities for athletes to discover their potential and push beyond perceived limits through structured, science-based training methods.

philosophy.description: Opportunities for athletes to discover their potential and push beyond perceived limits.
Building pathways to success through structured progression and skill development.
Adjusting mindsets, techniques, and approaches to optimize performance outcomes.
Setting ambitious yet achievable goals that inspire growth and dedication.

programs.name: Team Training
programs.shortDescription: High-energy group sessions perfect for team environments. Emphasizes competition, teamwork, and athletic performance.
programs.fullDescription: Dynamic, high-energy sessions designed for team environments with 6-8 athletes. Perfect for sports teams looking to build cohesion while improving individual performance.

programs.name: Small Group Training
programs.shortDescription: Focused coaching in a semi-private setting with skill-specific feedback and drills.
programs.fullDescription: Ideal for athletes looking to refine technique with focused coaching in a semi-private environment of 2-6 athletes.

programs.name: Private 1-on-1 Training
programs.shortDescription: Customized performance plan with direct coaching and progress tracking tailored to your goals.
programs.fullDescription: Completely customized training experience with one-on-one attention from elite coaches. Perfect for athletes serious about reaching their maximum potential.
features: Tailored to athlete's sport and goals

services.title: Strength & Conditioning
services.description: Build explosive power, speed, and endurance with sport-specific strength programs designed for athletic performance.

services.title: Speed & Agility
services.description: Improve your first step, change of direction, and overall agility with proven training methods used by elite athletes.

services.title: Injury Prevention
services.description: Reduce injury risk and build resilience through targeted mobility work, corrective exercises, and proper movement patterns.

services.title: Mental Performance
services.description: Develop mental toughness, focus, and confidence through sport psychology techniques and mindset training.

services.title: Nutrition Coaching
services.description: Optimize your diet for performance and recovery with personalized nutrition plans and ongoing support.

services.title: Video Analysis
services.description: Get detailed feedback on your technique with professional video breakdown and movement analysis.

pricing.name: Single Session
pricing.description: Perfect for trying out our training or focusing on a specific goal.

pricing.name: Monthly Package
pricing.description: Best value for consistent training and measurable results.

pricing.name: Team Program
pricing.description: Complete training solution for sports teams and groups.

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.quote: Training with CORE ATHLETE took my game to the next level. The personalized attention and sport-specific drills made all the difference in my performance.

testimonials.name: Sarah Martinez
testimonials.quote: The coaches here understand what it takes to compete at a high level. My vertical jump increased by 4 inches in just 3 months!

testimonials.name: Coach Williams
testimonials.quote: We've partnered with CORE ATHLETE for our off-season training program. The professionalism and results speak for themselves. Highly recommend!

onlinePrograms.title: Online Strength Program
onlinePrograms.description: 12-week progressive strength training program you can do from anywhere. Includes video demonstrations and weekly check-ins.

onlinePrograms.title: Speed & Agility Course
onlinePrograms.description: 8-week program focused on improving your speed, agility, and quickness with minimal equipment needed.

contact.address: 123 Training Center Dr, Your City, ST 12345
